roleset.note: More than any other verb we've encountered, 'wash' has a tendency to merge args. Intransitively, for example, "John washed" is the same as "John washed himself", showing that the subject of the first sentence includes both arg0 and arg1. Arg1 by default contains both the thing dirty and the dirt, but those can be separated as in the "wash hands of" example and "wash out of" example.
